bibl.title: A Schedule of Contracts and a Private Letter: P.Fay. 344.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: This papyrus was edited as part of the International Seminar on Unpublished Papyri in the Egyptian Museum. - The Writing Offices of Roman Egypt. - The Εἰρόμενον from Polydeukeia. - 1. P. Cair. Inv. 10862 recto (= P. Fay. 344 descr. recto). Schedule of Contracts from the Writing Office of Polydeukeia and Sethrenpai. Batn el-Harit (Theadelpheia), 88-96 CE. - 2. P. Cair. Inv. 10862 verso (= P. Fay. 344 descr. verso). ""She Does What She Wants"": A Letter Between Siblings. Batn el-Harit (Theadelpheia), II CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Cair. Inv. 10862 = P. Fay. 344 descr.
W. Graham Claytor, A Schedule of Contracts and a Private Letter: P.Fay. 344.

This papyrus was edited as part of the International Seminar on Unpublished Papyri in the Egyptian Museum. - The Writing Offices of Roman Egypt. - The Εἰρόμενον from Polydeukeia. - 1. P. Cair. Inv. 10862 recto (= P. Fay. 344 descr. recto). Schedule of Contracts from the Writing Office of Polydeukeia and Sethrenpai. Batn el-Harit (Theadelpheia), 88-96 CE. - 2. P. Cair. Inv. 10862 verso (= P. Fay. 344 descr. verso). ""She Does What She Wants"": A Letter Between Siblings. Batn el-Harit (Theadelpheia), II CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
